entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Watson Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:44 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Watson Lake Airport 11:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -4.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -5.7°C
Wind: N 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm except 10 cm over southern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm except 5 cm over southern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
